titles.title: Supporting the designation of October 23, 2023, as "AADC Deficiency Awareness Day".
Supporting the designation of October 23, 2023, as "AADC Deficiency Awareness Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of AADC Deficiency Awareness Day. Aromatic L-Amino Acid Decarboxylase (AADC) Deficiency is a genetic condition that affects an individual's development, motor skills, growth, and cognitive skills.
